nodes.text: S1D6-SA-5 was a red-colored SA-5 protocol droid that saw use on Kessel. It worked in the control hub to maintain all systems at peak efficiency. S1D6-SA-5 and the other droids used by the Pykes were freed in 10 BBY during an slave uprising started by the droid L3-37.

S1D6-SA-5 was portrayed by Stephanie Silva in the 2018 film Solo: A Star Wars Story, but appeared prior to its release in the "Kessel Run Millennium Falcon" LEGO set. The droid was identified only as "Kessel Operations Droid" by LEGO, but received a name in Solo: A Star Wars Story The Official Guide, a reference book written by Pablo Hidalgo and released alongside the film.
